headline: Evergy's Data-Center Boost Comes With a Long Runway, UBS Says
summary: Evergy (EVRG) growth outlook is becoming more tempered as much of the recent momentum is now reflect

headline: UBS Downgrades Evergy to Neutral, Raises Price Target to $88
summary: UBS  analyst William Appicelli   downgrades Evergy (NASDAQ:EVRG) from Buy to Neutral and raises the price target from $86 to $88.
